data.name: PBT - Events
data.detailed_description: This additional content will expand the capabilities of the Power Brain Trainer by adding temporary seasonal kits. It can be anything: textures, backgrounds, cursors, mini-games, tests or tasks. PBT Events will be dedicated to various world events. These can be holidays or even events in honor of the big Power Brain Trainer update.
data.about_the_game: This additional content will expand the capabilities of the Power Brain Trainer by adding temporary seasonal kits. It can be anything: textures, backgrounds, cursors, mini-games, tests or tasks. PBT Events will be dedicated to various world events. These can be holidays or even events in honor of the big Power Brain Trainer update.
data.short_description: Improvements to the Power Brain Trainer that will add seasonally limited time events.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or better
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
